string-array.name: onboarding_0
string-array.item: The patient must be standing straight (preferably against a wall)
The patient\'s photo should be taken with a monochromatic background (preferably black or white)
The picture must be taken with the cell phone or tablet in vertical position

string-array.name: onboarding_1
string-array.item: The patient must be looking straight at the camera
The patient must have both eyes open
The patient\'s head most be completely straight
Both patient\'s ears must be visible
The patient must be smiling (in occlusion)

string-array.name: onboarding_2
string-array.item: The patient must be looking straight at the camera
The patient must have both eyes open
The patient\'s head most be completely straight
Both patient\'s ears must be visible
The patient must be smiling (in occlusion)
The use of cheek retractors is necessary

string-array.name: onboarding_3
string-array.item: The use of cheek retractors is necessary
Close-up of upper and lower in occlusion
